name: Temple
description: Blazing with glamor and armed with an Infested guitar, Lizzie, Temple’s power chords light the flames of revolution.

abilities.name: Pyrotechnics
abilities.description:
Blast targeted enemies with pillars of <DT_FIRE_COLOR>Heat Damage. 

Backbeat Timing: Ignite even more pillars. Increases the Duration and <DT_FIRE_COLOR>Heat Damage of Ripper's Wail when it deals damage.

abilities.name: Overdrive
abilities.description:
Drive loudspeakers into epic distortion to create a damaging wave of <DT_FIRE_COLOR>Heat Damage while also increasing vulnerability to Critical Chance. 

Backbeat Timing: Doubles Critical Chance. Increases the Duration and <DT_FIRE_COLOR>Heat Damage of Ripper’s Wail when it deals damage.

abilities.name: Ripper's Wail
abilities.description:
Rip on the guitar to make Temple briefly invulnerable while healing them. Ally’s weapons in <AFFINITY_SHARE>Affinity Range are lit-up with extra <DT_FIRE_COLOR>Heat Damage each time an ability is used on the Backbeat and successfully hits enemies.

Backbeat Timing: Invulnerability lasts longer.

abilities.name: Exalted Solo
abilities.description:
Once a charge has been built up on the Backbeat metronome, set Lizzie aflame and torch enemies with <DT_FIRE_COLOR>Heat. While aimed, Lizzie blasts enemies with thunderous elemental sound waves, use ability controls to change the Elemental Damage type.

Backbeat Timing: No Energy consumed.

languages.description: Voller Glamour und bewaffnet mit deren Gitarre Lizzie, entzünden die mächtigen Akkorde von Temple die Flammen der Revolution.
languages.name: Temple

languages.description: Brûlant de glamour et armé d'une guitare Infestée, Lizzie, Temple et ses accords puissants allument les flammes de la révolution.
languages.name: Temple

languages.description: Con un'eleganza risplendente e una chitarra Infested di nome Lizzie, gli accordi potenti di Temple accendono le fiamme della rivoluzione.
languages.name: Temple

languages.description: 화려함으로 불타오르는 인페스티드 기타인 리지로 무장한 템플의 강력한 화음은 혁명의 불꽃을 밝힙니다.
languages.name: 템플

languages.description: Resplandeciente de glamour y con una guitarra infestada en mano, Lizzie, los acordes potentes de Temple encienden las llamas de la revolución.
languages.name: Temple

languages.description: 魅力四射的 Temple，手持他的感染吉他：丽兹，用强力的和弦点燃了革命的火焰。
languages.name: Temple

languages.description: Ослепительная и вооружённая заражённой гитарой Лиззи, Темпл зажигает пламя революции своими мощными аккордами.
languages.name: Темпл

languages.description: グラマラスな外見と感染されたギターLizzieと共に、Templeのパワーコードは革命の炎を焚き上げる。
languages.name: Temple

languages.description: Pełen blasku i uzbrojony w zainfekowaną gitarę, Lizzie, Temple rozpala płomienie rewolucji swoimi mocnymi akordami.
languages.name: Temple

languages.description: Com uma elegância resplandecente e em companhia de sua guitarra infestada, Lizzie, Temple toca poderosos acordes que acendem as chamas da revolução.
languages.name: Temple

languages.description: Temple 的魅力值爆表，手中握著一把感染吉他──莉慈，而他彈奏的强力和弦點燃革命之火。
languages.name: Temple

languages.description: เปล่งประกายด้วยเสน่ห์ร้อนแรงที่น่าดึงดูดและมีกีตาร์ติดเชื้อ Lizzie เป็นอาวุธติดตัวที่ Temple จะตีคอร์ดให้กระหึ่มเพื่อจุดไฟแห่งการปฏิวัติให้ลุกโชน
languages.name: Temple

languages.description: Göz kamaştırıcı ışıltısı ve infested gitarı Lizzie ile kuşanan Temple'ın güçlü akorları devrimin ateşini yakıyor.
languages.name: Temple

languages.description: Храм запалює вогні революції в гламурному вбранні та з найвідданішою зараженою подругою — гітарою Ліззі.
languages.name: Храм
